title: Match facts: Bayer Leverkusen v Roma (UEFA Champions League) - Talents Abroad
text:
Related UEFA Champions League group stage results & fixtures (3rd matchday) Egypt's Salah scores fourth Serie A goal as Roma beat Empoli 3-1 PHOTO GALLERY: Arsenal beat Manchester United, Real Madrid draw in derby, Roma win in Italy Roma beat Palermo, Inter move top of Serie A Full time: Bayer Leverkusen 4-4 Roma
Scorers: Hernandez 4 (pen), 19, Kampl 84, Mehmedi 86 / De Rossi 29, 38, Pjanic 54, Falque 73
Yellow cards: Kramer 37, Wendell 90 (Leverkusen)/ Nainggolan 25, De Rossi 35 (AS Roma)
Starting line-ups:
Bayer Leverkusen: Bernd Leno, Giulio Donati, Jonathan Tah, Kyriakos Papadopoulos, Wendell, Omer Toprak (Vladlen Yurchenko 79), Christoph Kramer (Julian Brandt 66), Karim Bellarabi (Admir Mehmedi 57), Hakan Calhanoglu, Kevin Kampl, Chicharito
AS Roma: Wojciech SzczÄ™sny, Vasilis Torosidis, Kostas Manolas, Antonio Rudiger, Lucas Digne, Miralem Pjanic, Daniele De Rossi, Radja Nainggolan, Alessandro Florenzi (Juan Manuel Iturbe 90), Gervinho (Eden Dzeko 85) , Mohamed Salah (Iago Falque 62)
Venue: BayArena, Leverkusen (GER)
Referee: Viktor Kassai (Hungary)
